name: license-compliance-check
description: Checks for incompatible or risky licenses in dependencies
prompt:
When installing packages, check license compatibility:

```
⚖️  LICENSE COMPLIANCE CHECK

Scanning package licenses...

⚠️  License Issues Found:

Package: [name]@[version]
License: GPL-3.0
Risk: HIGH

Issue:
• GPL requires open-sourcing derivative works
• May be incompatible with commercial use
• Requires legal review

Blocked Licenses:
• GPL (copyleft - requires open source)
• AGPL (strong copyleft)
• Commons Clause (restricted commercial use)

Allowed Licenses:
• MIT ✓
• Apache-2.0 ✓
• BSD ✓
• ISC ✓

Actions:
1. Find alternative with compatible license
2. Get legal approval
3. Use different approach

Proceed with GPL package? (yes/no/legal-review)
```
